text: Ndipo ena a iwo amamvetsera kwa iwe koma Ife taika tchingo m’mitima mwawo kuti asazindikire ndipo m’makutu mwawo ndi mogontha ndipo iwo akaona chizindikiro chilichonse, sadzachikhulupirira ndipo amadza kwa iwe kudzatsutsana nawe, ndipo anthu osakhulupirira amati: “Ichi sichina chilichonse koma nkhani zopeka za anthu a kale kwambiri.”
